explanation: [0-0] In a room with white walls and floor, there are yellow and brown lines on the floor. Inside the room, there's a family of five. In the front is a woman in a purple T-shirt. Behind her is a man with black glasses in a blue T-shirt. To the man's right is a little boy in a yellow T-shirt. Behind the boy is a woman in a pink T-shirt. Behind her is a man in a black T-shirt wearing a white wig. In front of the family is a black table with a turntable on it. Six bottles of milk tea in six colors (orange, white, purple, yellow, red, blue) are placed on the turntable. A hand is on the turntable on the left side. A woman wearing a purple T-shirt and an eye mask with eyes drawn on it is standing next to the turntable. She is holding a white straw in her left hand.

[0-5] The hand on the left side spins the turntable, causing the milk tea bottles to rotate along with it. The woman in the purple T-shirt pokes downwards with the straw three times, each time landing in the gaps between the milk tea bottles. Subsequently, a hand on the left side holding an inflatable hammer hits the woman in the purple T-shirt three times. The woman takes off the eye mask and looks at the milk tea on the turntable in surprise.
